name: Mechanoscuro
description:
Mechanoscuro is a top-down, turn-based puzzle game where you must navigate a series of mazes. You’re safe when you’re in the darkness… but you must walk through the light to get to the exit, and that’s when the monsters can see you.

Arrow keys (or WASD, or numeric pad) to move. Hold R to restart. Good luck!

Made during Global Game Jam 2022.
